articles.title: Over 22.7 Lakh Households in Gurugram Examined for Mosquito Larvae; Notices Issued to 11,311 Houses | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The District Health Department team is carrying out anti-larva activities in Gurugram, under which Temephos medicine is being sprayed at mosquito prone areas. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
articles.content: To prevent the outbreak of mosquito-borne diseases, the district Health Department collaborated with the district administration, examined over 22.70 lakh households and issued notices to 11,311 hous… [+1543 chars]
